name: Return to Reality
description:
Return to Reality is a movement fast-paced parkour 3D low poly game.

Game Info

You wake up in an unknown world, you don't know anything about what happened but you must return to your world. In this fast-paced parkour game, you will have to collect the universe shards in each level to open the portals but also avoid the enemies and obstacles from the unknown world. Try and see if you can finish each stage!

Credits

Programming, Visuals, 3D models and Project made by Tudypie

Music + support by The Captain Moo Moo

Controls

WASD - Move

Mouse - Look

Space - Jump

Left Click - Grapple on the blue cubes

Slide - Left Control

Additional Info

This game was made in 4 days for the 105$ Adventure Game Challenge. I may expand it more into a full release. Any feedback and ideas are welcomed! Please leave a comment if you enjoy playing :) Thanks for playing!

If you want to support me you can donate here: Ko-fi
